pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, September 21, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Minister-President of Baden-Württemberg Winfried Kretschmann.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Photo opportunity

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with President of the Republic of Namibia Dr. Hage G. Geingob.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Photo opportunity

Scarborough, Ontario

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable with Scarborough small business leaders.

Prompt Assembly & Packaging
228 Midwest Road

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:30 p.m.

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Grand Opening of the South Asian Autism Awareness Centre.

South Asian Autism Awareness Centre
Unit 63, 705 Progress Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 5:45 p.m.                

7:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Chinese Cultural Centre of Greater Toronto’s Mid-Autumn Festival.

Chinese Cultural Centre of Greater Toronto
5183 Sheppard Avenue East

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the North entrance no later than 6:50 p.m.
    • Parking is available in the East parking lot, off of Sheppard Avenue.
